title: Serena Williams’s First Children’s Book to Come Out September 2022
sub_head: Tennis star based story on daughter’s favorite doll, which is already an internet sensation
body:
Serena Williams is adding another title to her résumé: children’s book author.
The tennis star and 23-time singles Grand Slam champion wrote “The Adventures of Qai Qai” based on her daughter’s favorite doll. The children’s picture book, published by Macmillan imprint Feiwel and Friends, will come out Sept. 27, 2022.
